Most people don't understand that Bitcoin is essentially a form of digital alcohol.  Alcohol is a technology for turning costly to store, quickly rotting assets (grain, fruit etc.) into an easy-to-store asset that doesn't rot or degrade.  Bitcoin is the same but with electricity.
